featured.title: Suzuki Service Campaign
featured.description: Customer safety-focused service campaign platform ensuring Suzuki vehicles meet the highest quality and safety standards.
contributions: Developed Laravel API backend using a modular architecture
Implemented reusable CRUD patterns to significantly reduce development and production time
Provided React frontend support when the team required additional resources

featured.title: Wacoal Shopify
featured.description: E-commerce storefront and content-driven shopping experience built on Shopify, featuring custom Liquid templates and backend integrations.
contributions: Implemented frontend features using HTML and JavaScript
Worked with Shopify Flow, webhooks, and custom Shopify app logic
Developed Laravel middleware and API integrations for branch- and country-specific requirements

personal.title: Shopify Token Generator
personal.description: A personal utility tool created to streamline Shopify app setup after platform changes removed easy access to access tokens.
contributions: Built a token generation utility to adapt to Shopify platform changes introduced in January 2026
Designed the tool to improve development efficiency during Shopify app setup
Used the project as hands-on practice to strengthen Python skills

personal.title: CMS Desktop App
personal.description: A modular desktop CMS built as the foundation for a tenant management system. Designed with core features such as authentication, user management, role-based access control, and system settings, allowing the application to be reused and extended across future personal and business projects.
contributions: Architected the core CMS foundation for a planned tenant management system
Implemented authentication, role-based access control, and system configuration
Designed the system to be reusable across future personal and business applications
Used the project as hands-on practice to strengthen Python skills

personal.title: Ajipanda

contributions: Developed and maintained backend APIs to support e-commerce functionality
Handled system integrations required for storefront operations

personal.title: The Hub (San Miguel Corporation)
personal.description: The SMC Hub is the official online shopping platform of San Miguel Corporation, offering trusted food, beverage, and essential consumer brands.
contributions: Contributed to backend e-commerce API development
Supported core platform functionality and system integrations

personal.title: BDO Cash Availment
personal.description: A digital cash availment platform where customers enter a reference number, receive OTP verification, and select flexible payment plans.
contributions: Implemented frontend features using React

personal.title: PCUP Accreditation System
personal.description: A government accreditation processing system handling form submissions, ocular inspections, data validation, and pre-accreditation workflows.
contributions: Developed and maintained the Admin Panel / CMS for accreditation processing

personal.title: Ajinomoto Shopify E-commerce
personal.description: Enterprise Shopify e-commerce platform for gourmet and culinary products. Built and maintained a Laravel API, admin panel, Line Login integration, and Shopify webhooks for real-time operations.
contributions: Developed Laravel backend APIs and Shopify webhooks

Handled real-time integrations for orders and app-related workflows
